articles.description: An Arabic commentator lavished praise on Cristiano Ronaldo following his brace in the 4-3 AFC Champions League win against Qatari side Al-Duhail on Tuesday.
articles.content:
An Arabic commentator lavished praise on Cristiano Ronaldo following his brace in the 4-3 AFC Champions League win against Qatari side Al-Duhail on Tuesday.
